body: It's not pressing right now, but we'll keep re-running aggregation as long as we get new data tagged with particular experiments, and given what we've seen from TelEx, I think there's a good chance we'll keep getting data long after experiments are over. Not a huge deal until we have more than a handful of experiments but we'll probably want this within a month or so.
